channel.title: Plz Help! how to add a shop into a serve!
channel.description: How to add a shop into mine server!?!?!?! :confused: :confused: ty whos sed it!!! ;D

item.title: Plz Help! how to add a shop into a serve!
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

open client.java and search this

WanneShop =

Make a line and add

else if (NPCID == NPCID) { PutNPCCords = true; WanneShop = SHOPID; }
replace NPCID with the npc you want to be the shopkeeper and SHOPID with your shopid(well explain shopid later)
add this in shops.cfg

shop = SHOPID	SHOPNAME	1	1	ITEMID	 PRICE	ITEMID	 PRICE	ITEMID	 PRICE

make sure the shopid you pick isnt already being used
And spawn the npc you used earlier

Read full topic
item.source: Plz Help! how to add a shop into a serve!
